title: The 'Toy Story' You Remember
author: ani_obsessive
aiHeadline: Remember when Toy Story was just about toys and not a billion-dollar franchise? Turns out, even your childhood favorites can't escape the corporate machine.

title: FFmpeg to Google: Fund us or stop sending bugs

aiHeadline: FFmpeg tells Google: 'Either fund us or stop spamming us with bugsâ€”seriously, we're not your free tech support.'

title: iPhone Pocket
author: soheilpro
aiHeadline: Apple introduces the iPhone Pocket: because carrying your phone in your hand wasn't inconvenient enough, right?

title: SoftBank sells its entire stake in Nvidia
author: mfiguiere
aiHeadline: SoftBank sells entire stake in Nvidia: because who needs to make money when you can just buy and sell companies for fun?

title: Collaboration sucks
author: Kinrany
aiHeadline: Collaboration sucks: because nothing says 'teamwork' like endless meetings, conflicting opinions, and somehow always ending up with a worse result than if you'd just done it alone.
